p: The specimens were captured in different districts of the city and in different years and months, indicating that the species has established in the region. It is probable that the spotted-wing drosophila could have been unintentionally introduced to the Caucasus with imported fruits. Fruit production and wine production are important aspects of the economy in the Russian Caucasus region, so the establishment of D. suzukii could cause serious economic losses. Quarantine measures should be taken to prevent dispersal of this pest in the surrounding regions and especially in the Caucasus.
